程序包 engine

接口 DataCollection

所有已知实现类:
BookingsCollection, SitesCollection, UsersCollection
public interface DataCollection
Interface for DataCollection

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    default Booking createHomeBooking​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String customerId, java.lang.String siteId, boolean hasRATKit)
    Create home booking
    default java.lang.String createOnsiteBooking​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String customerId, java.lang.String siteId)
    Create on site booking
    java.util.ArrayList<TestingSite> filterByOnFactor​(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String value)
    fills the list with the data from the json file by using one factor at a time
    Entity findEntity​(java.lang.String factor)
    find the specific entity by its id or name
    default Entity getStatusByPin​(java.lang.String pinCode)
    Getting status(other information) of the site through input PIN code - implemented in BookingsCollection
    void printWholeList()
    prints the list of entities to the console
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode searchForEntity​(java.lang.String factor, java.lang.String query)
    searches for other type of entity from this entity (search for inline entities) Note: Each kind of entity has different factor to use for the search
    default boolean updateHasRATKit​(java.lang.String QRcode, boolean hasRATKit)
    Update HasRATKit field in the booking entity; true if the customer has RAT kit
    default void updateWaitingTime​(java.lang.String siteId)
    Update the waiting time for Testing Site implemented in SitesCollection

  • 方法详细资料

    • findEntity

      Entity findEntity​(java.lang.String factor)
      find the specific entity by its id or name
      参数:
      factor - - based on which collection to search, nomally it is id or name
      返回:
      - the entity that matches the filter

    • searchForEntity

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode searchForEntity​(java.lang.String factor, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      searches for other type of entity from this entity (search for inline entities) Note: Each kind of entity has different factor to use for the search
      参数:
      factor - - a field value to be used for the filter - it must be unique like id
      query - - choose one from Query Enum, a correct path to query the data
      返回:
      - the entity that matches the filter
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • printWholeList

      void printWholeList()
      prints the list of entities to the console

    • filterByOnFactor

      java.util.ArrayList<TestingSite> filterByOnFactor​(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String value)
      fills the list with the data from the json file by using one factor at a time
      参数:
      field - - the field name to be used for the filter
      value - - the value of the field to be used for the filter
      返回:
      - the list of entities that match the filter

    • updateWaitingTime

      default void updateWaitingTime​(java.lang.String siteId) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Update the waiting time for Testing Site implemented in SitesCollection
      参数:
      siteId - - the id of the site to be updated
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • getStatusByPin

      default Entity getStatusByPin​(java.lang.String pinCode)
      Getting status(other information) of the site through input PIN code - implemented in BookingsCollection
      参数:
      pinCode - - the pin code returned once a booking is confirmed
      返回:
      - An entity type object ==> actually a booking entity/object

    • createOnsiteBooking

      default java.lang.String createOnsiteBooking​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String customerId, java.lang.String siteId) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Create on site booking
      参数:
      type - - the type of booking (home/on-site)
      customerId - - the id of the customer
      siteId - - the id of the site
      返回:
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • createHomeBooking

      default Booking createHomeBooking​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String customerId, java.lang.String siteId, boolean hasRATKit) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Create home booking
      参数:
      type - - the type of booking (home/on-site)
      customerId - - the id of the customer
      siteId - - the id of the site
      hasRATKit - - true if the customer has RAT kit
      返回:
      - the booking id
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • updateHasRATKit

      default boolean updateHasRATKit​(java.lang.String QRcode, boolean hasRATKit) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Update HasRATKit field in the booking entity; true if the customer has RAT kit
      参数:
      QRcode - - the QR code of the booking
      hasRATKit - - true if the customer has RAT kit
      返回:
      - Boolean value - if the update was successful
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException
